title: Pre-breeding for durable resistance to rust diseases in hexaploid wheat
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This Brazil-UK Partnering award is still ongoing. One PhD student has spent 6 months working in the UK, and staff from NIAB have visited with researchers in Brazil. Agriculture, Food and Drink Societal
